textos_fuente.text: Monthly RV Sites near Gainesville Florida Skip to content staff@gainesvillervpark.com +1 352-559-8712 Facebook Instagram Tripadvisor Yelp Campground Caravan Fire-alt Flag-usa Home About Photos Attractions Honest RV Parks Contact Guest Login Home About Photos Attractions Honest RV Parks Contact Guest Login Check Availability Ask about our outdoor RV and Boat Storage! Reserve your space today! Monthly RV Sites Stay awhile... Whether your working in the area on a short-term basis or staying for a season, our RV Park has all that you‚Äôll need. Plans are currently in progress to renovate the pavilion and begin construction on a pool & fitness center. Contact Us Site Type Overview $650 30 amp Standard $700 50 amp Premium $700 30/50 amp Pond $700 50 amp Premium Plus Note: sites with a concrete patio are an extra $25/month. Rates Include Basic WiFi Electricity Water Sewer Trash Learn More Apply Today! Monthly reservations require a few additional steps. Reservations for long term RV sites are vetted by park staff and cannot be booked online. This helps us ensure that the park guests and guests‚Äô property meet our requirements. Application Process for Long Term Reservations: Guest contacts the park office to receive an application Guest returns the completed application, $35 application fee per person and $55 per couple, and pictures of their RV to the park staff Staff performs a background check and notifies guest of approval status Guest provides a $250 non-refundable deposit to hold their site Guest signs a Site Service Agreement prior to date of check-in Monthly Guidelines Application All guests must be included on the application All guests 18 years and older will be required to have a background check Monthly Site Fees $15 and $40 late fees are automatically charged to the guest bill (after a 3 day grace period) Guests can pay in person via check, cash or credit card All credit card payments will incur a Credit Card Transaction fee of -3% Pets Dog Policy At RVPM and Honest RV Parks, we love dogs, and we strive to create a welcoming environment for all guests who want to share their camping experience with their furry companions. To ensure a safe and enjoyable stay for everyone, we kindly ask you to follow our dog policy: Aggressive dogs of any breed are not permitted. If your dog displays protective or unfriendly behavior towards strangers, we kindly request that you do not bring them to our park. If such behavior is observed, we may (at our sole discretion) ask the owner and the dog to leave. Pet restrictions may vary among our locations. Some parks have limited or no availability for units or cabins that allow pets. We encourage dog owners to call in advance to check availability and discuss their situation. Registered service dogs are welcome at all RVPM/Honest RV parks and are subject to the same rules and restrictions listed here. We welcome a maximum of two dogs per site. All dogs must have documentation of current vaccinations. We may ask you to provide copies of vaccination records to our office before you check in. All dogs must be under their owners‚Äô control and visual supervision at all times. Please do not leave dogs unattended or tied up outside. Except in designated off-leash dog park amenity areas, all dogs must be on a leash no longer than 6 feet anytime they are outside. Non-service dogs are not allowed in common-area buildings or pool areas. Registered service dogs must be wearing visible tags to enter these areas. Disruptive, excessive, or uncontrolled barking is not allowed. If barking persists and becomes a nuisance to fellow guests, we may (at our sole discretion) ask the owner and the dog to leave. Owners are responsible for cleaning up after their pets and properly disposing of pet waste in designated bins. Pet owners are responsible for any injuries, damage, or disturbances caused by their pets to other guests, park staff, or visitors. RVPM is not responsible for the safety of your dog(s), or for any loss, damage, or injury caused to or by our four-legged guests. Thank you for your cooperation in maintaining a dog-friendly and harmonious environment for all guests at our RV parks. Here at Gainesville RV Park your overall experience is important to us. We appreciate your business and hope to see you back year after year. About Our RV Park Near Gainesville Florida Skip to content staff@gainesvillervpark.com +1 352-559-8712 Facebook Instagram Tripadvisor Yelp Campground Caravan Fire-alt Flag-usa Home About Photos Attractions Honest RV Parks Contact Guest Login Home About Photos Attractions Honest RV Parks Contact Guest Login Check Availability Ask about our outdoor RV and Boat Storage! Reserve your space today! About Us Experience  Warm Hospitality Here at Gainesville your overall experience is important to us. We appreciate your business and hope to see you back year after year. Nearby Businesses Restaurants Our Classic Cafe, Subway, Dunkin Donuts and Wendy's are in close proximity Fuel 24 hour Pilot is in walking distance for food, snacks, gas and other essentials. Shopping Dollar General is across the highway and Super Wal-Mart is also not far away. Medical Offices It's quick and easy to get to Gainesville medical facilities from our RV Park. RV Park Facilities Gated Entrance Our RV park has a gated entrance.¬† Guests who arrive before 5pm will be escorted to their site. Laundry We have a laundry room with coin-operated washing machines and dryers for guests. We have a 3/4 acre catch-and-release pond that is 28-foot-deep and stocked with fish. Stocked Pond The fitness center is now open. Fitness Center Restrooms Our RV park has separate women and men bathrooms with showers that are available to park guests. Screen Room Our Screen Room is an open air building with tables and chairs.¬† It is available to all guests and can be booked for private events. Our RV Park is pet friendly.¬† We allow up to 3 pets per guest and offer a large fenced in dog run, for our furry friends to stretch their legs. Pet Park Classic Cafe is located at the front of the park along Hwy 301.¬† The cafe hours are Tuesday-Sunday 7am-3pm. Restaurant Reservations Include The following amenities are included with each reservation‚Ä¶ Electrical Hookup Water Hookup Sewer Hookup (most sites) WiFi Parking Access to group Facilities Access to Laundry Facilities Access to Bathhouse Facilities Bathhouse Pet Park Screen room RV Park Rules Reservations Included in each reservation: 2 adults, 2 children, 1 pet, 1 vehicle $5 for each additional guest, pet or vehicle with a max of 6 guests per site and 2 pets per site. Required deposit is 1 day or full amount on all event or holiday weekends. We collect full payment up on check in. Cancellations Guests receive a full refund minus a $25 cancellation fee if cancelled before 48 hours of check-in on standard, short term reservations. After 48 hours, the reservation balance is forfeited and will not be applied to a future stay. Holiday and event says 7 days to get FULL refund. Please change to refund minus $25 cancellation fee. Long term guests can put down a $100 deposit to hold their site, but it is not refundable in the event of a cancellation. General Rules Quiet hours are between 10 pm until 8 am 5 mph speed limit in the park No fireworks are allowed to be discharged in the park Check-in is 1pm.¬† We ask that guests check in upon arrival or call if arriving after hours All visitors must check in at the office Check out is 11am. We ask that guests please inform the office upon departure Pet Policy Aggressive dogs of any breed are not permitted . If your dog displays protective or unfriendly behavior towards strangers, we kindly request that you do not bring them to our park. If such behavior is observed , we may (at our sole discretion) ask the owner and the dog to leave. Pet restrictions may vary among our locations. Some parks have limited or no availability for units or cabins that allow pets. We encourage dog owners to call in advance to check availability and discuss their situation. Registered service dogs are welcome at all RVPM/Honest RV parks and are subject to the same rules and restrictions listed here. We welcome a maximum of two dogs per site. All dogs must have documentation of current vaccinations. We may ask you to provide copies of vaccination records to our office before you check in. All dogs must be under their owners‚Äô control and visual supervision at all times . Please do not leave dogs unattended or tied up outside. Except in designated off-leash dog park amenity areas, a ll dogs must be on a leash no longer than 6 feet anytime they are outside . Non-service dogs are not allowed in common-area buildings or pool areas. Registered service dogs must be wearing visible tags to enter these areas. Disruptive, excessive, or uncontrolled barking is not allowed . If barking persists and becomes a nuisance to fellow guests, we may (at our sole discretion) ask the owner and the dog to leave. Owners are responsible for cleaning up after their pets and properly disposing of pet waste in designated bins . Pet owners are responsible for any injuries, damage , or disturbances caused by their pets to other guests , park staff, or visitors . RV Park is not responsible for the safety of your dog(s) , or for any loss, damage, or injury caused to or by our four -legged guests. Thank you for your cooperation in maintaining a dog -friendly and harmonious environment for all guests at Gainesville RV Park. Here at Gainesville RV Park your overall experience is important to us. We appreciate your business and hope to see you back year after year. indoor RV storage | Weaver Boat & RV Storage LLC | Gainesville, Georgia Welcome Our Facility Pricing Location Contact Us Our Facility Call us for quality storage! 770-889-2599 Our Facility Weaver Boat & RV Storage LLC provides quality indoor storage for RVs and boats. Our property is clean, well maintained, and safe. Need more details? Here are three reasons why you should leave your property in our care: 1.  We are secure! We provide 24-hour video surveillance using multiple cameras. Also, customers use personal codes to both enter and exit our facility. For added protection, we also have a security person who resides on the property. 2.  We offer quality! Our facility is equipped with 164 covered and 46 enclosed units to protect your RV from weather and the sun. We also have completely paved 50-foot driveways and 6-foot chain-link fences. In addition, for ease of access and parking, we have two gates with upper and lower keypads. Customers have 24-hour access to the facility. We also provide a courtesy wash-down area that has water, electricity, and air. Our cement floors are clean and level, and we offer electricity (up to 30 amps) and lighting in bays. 3.  We are conveniently located! Weaver Boat & RV Storage LLC is located close to parks and ramps (1/4 mile), convenience stores and Georgia 400 (exits 17 and 18). Now that you‚Äôve learned a little more about us, we hope to hear from you soon. Please contact us today for service. YP Reviews Be the first to review us Your feedback is important! Contact Information Weaver Boat & RV Storage LLC 5190 Browns Bridge Road Cumming, GA 30041 Phone: 770-889-2599 Fax: 770-889-2529 weaver30041@bellsouth.net Business Hours: 24 hours a day, seven days a week! RV Storage in Gainesville, FL: Compare Prices & Find Your Spot Sign Up Log In Help List Your RV Home RV Storage Florida Gainesville RV Storage in Gainesville, Florida If you like to take camping trips in Florida, you should check out the Gainesville area because there are many things to see and do in this part of the state. However, you may need to find a location to store your RV between trips. The cost for RV storage in Gainesville varies based on the size of the RV and the type of space you want. Our curated list includes addresses, hours, rates, and direct links for the best RV storage facilities. This makes it easy to compare places for storing your RV near Gainesville. Storage Zone This is another Gainesville RV self storage facility to consider. It is located right next to the University of Florida, and it is just a few minutes away from the airport. RV storage spaces range in size, but most RVs will fit in a space here. Why You‚Äôll Love Storage Zone The facility is well-lit and secure. They have video surveillance as well as individuals to walk around and monitor the grounds. The property is fenced-in, and there is a gate that requires a code for entry. Storage Zone Information Location 1801 Northeast 23rd Avenue Gainesville, FL 32609 (904) 674-2428 Office Hours Monday ‚Äì Friday, 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Additional Info Website Store Space This is a storage facility that is known for caring about its customers. The facility is kept clean so that the renters feel more at home when they need access to their RVs. In addition, this is an easy-to-reach location that allows access to storage spaces 24 hours a day. Why You‚Äôll Love Store Space The property is well-secured with fencing, a secure gate, and lighting that keep the area bright and easy to see. Store Space Information Location 3728 North Main Street Gainesville, FL 32609 (409) 226-0593 Office Hours Monday ‚Äì Friday, 9:00 a.m. to 5:30 p.m., Saturday, 9:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Additional Info Website 43rd Street Self Storage This is an outside RV storage Gainesville facility that is relatively easy to reach. The facility opened up in 2000, which gives the owners two decades of experience. They have won awards for their customer service and the cleanliness of the facility. Why You‚Äôll Love 43rd Street Self Storage This RV storage facility is well-lit, which will give you some peace of mind if you need to access it in the dark. A fence surrounds the property, and access is limited. There is also 24-hour video footage of the entire property being recorded. 43rd Street Self Storage Information Location 9417 Northwest 43rd Street Gainesville, FL 32653 +3523774321 Office Hours Monday ‚Äì Friday, 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m., Saturday, 9:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Additional Info Website Gainesville Self Storage This is a storage solution that is easy to reach, especially if you are coming in from a major highway. The grounds are kept clean, and the spaces are well-lit to keep your RV secure. In addition, there is video surveillance at the electronic gate and around the rest of the property. Why You‚Äôll Love Gainesville Self Storage This business offers a referral program to renters who refer a friend or family member to one of their facilities, which will give them $25 off their rental. Gainesville Self Storage¬† Information Location 6505 Southwest Archer Road Gainesville, FL 32608 +3524624210 Office Hours 24 hours a day, seven days a week Peoples Choice Storage High Springs We offer a secure and affordable place to park your RV or boat. Our facility is equipped with large drive aisles that are perfect for short or long-term storage. Our facility is fully fenced and gated, and offers covered and uncovered parking, power outlets, and 24-hour access. Why You‚Äôll Love Peoples Choice Storage High Springs We offer covered units with ample space and easy access. Our facility is fully fenced and gated, and offer covered and uncovered parking, power outlets, and 24-hour access. Our friendly and knowledgeable staff are RV enthusiasts and can offer personalized storage solutions. We offer competitive rates and attractive promotions; rates vary based on demand. Peoples Choice Storage High Springs Information Location 26020 W. U.S. Hwy 27 High Springs, FL 32643 (386) 454-0477 Office Hours 6:00 AM - 10:00 PM Access Hours 6:00 AM - 10:00 PM Additional Info Website Box Turtle RV, Boat and Self Storage If you are looking for covered RV storage in Gainesville, then Box Turtle RV, Boat and Self Storage is a great place to begin your search. They are conveniently positioned between Gainesville and Alachua on Route 441. The manager lives on the property, so someone will always be watching over your RV. Why You‚Äôll Love Box Turtle RV, Boat and Self Storage This facility is designed to accommodate larger RVs, and many of the 40- to 50-foot options offer power for the renter to use. Box Turtle RV, Boat and Self Storage Information Location 3401 Northwest 120th Lane Gainesville, FL 32653 (386) 462-2790 Office Hours 24 hours a day, seven days a week Additional Info Website Santa Fe Self Storage Another RV storage facility in Gainesville, Florida, to consider is Santa Fe Self Storage. This location is locally owned and operated, so this is the owners‚Äô home as well as their business. RV storage at this location is outdoors. Why You‚Äôll Love Santa Fe Self Storage This is a secure facility that has an access gate and fencing surrounding the property. There are also security cameras watching the grounds 24 hours a day. Santa Fe Self Storage Information Location 3033 Northeast 53rd Avenue Gainesville, FL 32609 +3523730004 Office Hours Monday ‚Äì Friday, 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m., Saturday, 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Additional Info Website Interstate Mini Storage This is a company that has been in the storage business for over 25 years, so you can expect them to be experienced. This RV storage facility has spots that go up to 50 feet in length. In addition, the facility is located right off Interstate 75, which makes it extremely easy to reach. Why You‚Äôll Love Interstate Mini Storage The aisles are extra-wide so that you don‚Äôt have an issue parking your RV, and there is a complimentary wash station that you can use to clean your RV when you get back from a trip. Interstate Mini Storage Information Location 2707 Southwest 40th Boulevard Gainesville, FL 32608 +3523710852 Office Hours Monday ‚Äì Friday, 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m., Saturday, 9:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. In Summary If you need a place for RV storage in Gainesville, you have plenty of options, and some have amenities like an RV dump station or wash bays. Many of these locations are easy to reach, even if you fly in from another state. You can find an RV rental near Gainesville if you don't have your own . However you roll, always make campground reservations early to secure the best spot on your chosen dates. Frequently Asked Questions about RV Storage in Gainesville, Florida On average, how much is RV storage in Gainesville, Florida per month? RV Storage prices can be different from state to state, as well as, city to city. On average, RV storage costs about $130 per month. This rate is dependent on different factors such as security, indoor or outdoor parking, and access to the facilities. What is the cheapest RV storage in Gainesville, Florida? Some of the cheapest RV storage prices are in the $40-$50 range. In most cases, the bigger the unit size, the more expensive the monthly pricing will be, so keep this in mind when looking for storage for your RV. What is the cost of indoor RV storage vs outdoor storage in Gainesville, Florida? Outdoor, uncovered storage is the most affordable option, but also provides the least amount of protection for your RV. This storage costs on average $30-$50 per month. Outdoor, covered RV storage is an outdoor parking spot that is protected by an awning structure and costs on average $30-$100 per month. Indoor storage provides the most protection for your RV and ranges from $50-$125 per month. How to prepare your RV for long-term storage? You want to first prepare your RV by finding good storage space. You may then want to consider investing in a good RV cover that can help prevent mold and mildew. Next, you will want to clean both your storage and RV to get rid of all the dirt and to keep pests away. Lastly, you want to shut down any appliances you have, empty out the tanks, and close all windows. This will keep your RV in great shape and ready for when you use it on your next road trip. How secure are RV storage facilities? RV storage facilities provide different options in order to ensure the safety of your RV. Many facilities use a perimeter fence to keep intruders out, as well as 24/7 security cameras to monitor who comes and goes from the storage unit. Others use coded entry systems for added protection. Do RV storage facilities have dump stations? Not all storage facilities have dump stations, but there are some that do. You can find dump stations near you or for more information on RV storage facilities, click here . Welcome To Gainesville RV Park +RV Storage and Boat Storage Contact Us Book Now Enjoy the Florida Sunshine Conveniently located on Hwy 301, we are within minutes of Gainesville and the University of Florida. Within an hour you can see the beaches of St. Augustine, the natural springs of High Springs, Jacksonville attractions, the beautiful horse country of Ocala or enjoy a Gulf of Mexico sunset at Cedar Key. If you wish to have all the comforts of a full RV hook-up, we offer a get-away that is just what you‚Äôve been looking for. Learn More Attractions RV Park Amenities Free WiFi Basic WiFi is available to all guests. Premium WiFi can also be purchased. Laundry We have coin operated laundry facilities on site. Restaurant Classic Cafe is located at the front of the park along Hwy 301. Party Space We have a screen room and a pavilion that can be reserved for private events. Lake for fishing Our 3/4 acre catch-and-release stocked pond is a guest favorite at our RV Park. Pet Park We offer a large fenced in dog run, for our furry friends to stretch their legs. Bathhouse We have bathrooms with showers that are available to park guests. Concierge Propane Our park offers propane for sale, so fill up before you hit the road. We specialize in RV, boat, trailer, and vehicle storage, offering quick access to major freeways for your travel needs. Nestled near beautiful lakes and centrally positioned between the Pacific Ocean and the beautiful Sierra Nevada Mountains, our facility is the perfect solution for outdoor enthusiasts seeking a secure place to store their recreational vehicles. Trust us to provide exceptional service and a safe environment for your valued possessions.
